message: If so my ex-roommate has one he will not use that he is willing to give away.
"Registrations may be transferred to someone else at any time; just write to mailto:pycon-reg@python.org with the details." http://us.pycon.org/2011/tickets/refund_policy/
I'm eagerly looking for registration. If it is still available, hit me up at jason@wohlford.org.
To quote @jessenoller: If you have questions like this - it's better, and faster - to contact the reg department, 847-759-4277 / pycon4-reg@cteusa.com / or pycon-reg@python.org
@skyl meant, what single tutorial do you have ? if transferable, I'd be interested.
@skyl You can email the organizers list about it
I think we are still accepting tutorial registrations, not 100% though so don't quote me on that :-)
@Koding Geospatial at 1:20 tomorrow.  Not sure if I can give it away yet or if I'm going.  I have a son who is going to be born around that time.

@skyl Best wished on the expected arrival !!! I have a data mining around that time, hence will pass. Best of luck again !
